languages.text: {n}Мужчина отводит взгляд.{/n} "Мне жаль, что мои слова вас расстроили — я не имел намерения вас оскорбить. Примите глубочайшие извинения. Можете поступать с грузом как пожелаете — я передам Наместнику ваши слова".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина отводит взгляд.{/n} "Мне жаль, что мои слова вас расстроили — я не имел намерения вас оскорбить. Примите глубочайшие извинения. Можете поступать с грузом как пожелаете — я передам Наместнику ваши слова".

languages.text: {n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина отводит взгляд.{/n} "Мне жаль, что мои слова вас расстроили — я не имел намерения вас оскорбить. Примите глубочайшие извинения. Можете поступать с грузом как пожелаете — я передам Наместнику ваши слова".

{n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."

{n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."

{n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."

{n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."

languages.text: {n}他移开了目光。{/n}“如果我的话让您感到不快，我非常抱歉。我这么做绝对不是为了侮辱您，请接受我最深切的歉意。这批货物该如何处理，全权由您决定，我会把您的话传达给总督。”
languages.original_text: {n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."

traits.locale_text: {n}他移开了目光。{/n}“如果我的话让您感到不快，我非常抱歉。我这么做绝对不是为了侮辱您，请接受我最深切的歉意。这批货物该如何处理，全权由您决定，我会把您的话传达给总督。”

languages.text: {n}Mira a otro lado.{/n} «Siento mucho haberle molestado; no pretendía faltarle al respeto. Acepte mis disculpas, por favor. El destino del cargamento yace en sus manos; le comunicaré sus palabras al señor».
languages.original_text: {n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mira a otro lado.{/n} «Siento mucho haberle molestado; no pretendía faltarle al respeto. Acepte mis disculpas, por favor. El destino del cargamento yace en sus manos; le comunicaré sus palabras al señor».

languages.text: {n}男は視線を逸らす。{/n}「私の発言で動揺させてしまって申し訳ありません。侮辱するつもりはなかったのです。心よりお詫びします。貨物の運命はあなたが決めること…私はその言葉を領主に届けます」
languages.original_text: {n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は視線を逸らす。{/n}「私の発言で動揺させてしまって申し訳ありません。侮辱するつもりはなかったのです。心よりお詫びします。貨物の運命はあなたが決めること…私はその言葉を領主に届けます」

languages.text: {n}Er wendet den Blick ab.{/n} "Ich bedauere zutiefst, dass meine Worte Euch erzürnt haben – sie sollten Euch keinesfalls beleidigen. Bitte akzeptiert meine Entschuldigung. Das Schicksal der Fracht sei Euch überlassen – ich werde Eure Worte dem Lehnsherren übermitteln."
languages.original_text: {n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er wendet den Blick ab.{/n} "Ich bedauere zutiefst, dass meine Worte Euch erzürnt haben – sie sollten Euch keinesfalls beleidigen. Bitte akzeptiert meine Entschuldigung. Das Schicksal der Fracht sei Euch überlassen – ich werde Eure Worte dem Lehnsherren übermitteln."

languages.text: {n}Il détourne le regard.{/n} « Je suis terriblement désolé si mes paroles vous ont paru blessantes... Je n'avais nullement l'intention de vous insulter. Je vous présente mes plus plates excuses. C'est à vous qu'il revient de décider du sort du chargement... Je transmettrai votre message au suzerain. »
languages.original_text: {n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il détourne le regard.{/n} « Je suis terriblement désolé si mes paroles vous ont paru blessantes... Je n'avais nullement l'intention de vous insulter. Je vous présente mes plus plates excuses. C'est à vous qu'il revient de décider du sort du chargement... Je transmettrai votre message au suzerain. »

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n} "Sözlerimle canınızı sıktığım için çok özür dilerim, hakaret manasıyla söylememiştim. Lütfen en içten özürlerimi kabul edin. Kargoya ne olacağına da siz karar verin. Ben de diyeceklerinizi Emîr'e ileteyim."
languages.original_text: {n}He looks away.{/n} "I am terribly sorry that my words have upset you — they were not meant as an insult. Please accept my deepest apologies. The cargo's fate is yours to decide — I will deliver your words to the Liege."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n} "Sözlerim sizi üzdüğü için çok özür dilerim, hakaret manasıyla söylememiştim. Lütfen en içten özürlerimi kabul edin. Kargoya ne olacağına da siz karar verin, kararınızı Emîr'e ileteceğim."
